location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 31 TO ILLUSTRATE THE PASSAGE OF THE ADHAIM 18th. April, 1917.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 93 x 140mm, on sheet 216 x 338mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume III, and shows a region around the confluence of the River Tigris and the River Adhaim [Nahr al ‘Uz̧aym] in central and eastern Iraq, indicating watercourses, old canals, settlements and tracks. Rivers are printed in blue, and Turkish positions are printed in green.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1925.
